review: Hotel facilities have deteriorated over the years and my stay this this time was particular disappointing. Staff is untrained and needs grooming. Rooms are very basic, even the super deluxe rooms. Food is also average in taste and quality.
name: AmitBist

review: Hotel location is in city center only. The stay was nice. Rooms are Large and Clean. Hotel staff is Good and their service is awesome. Food served is also Tasty and for a reasonable price. I Will recommend this Hotel to others.
name: Rahul S Khatri

review: Excellent staff. Helped with early check-in and even even allowed to get fresh n up hours after check out. Nice rooms. We were four friends and they gave us two rooms facing each other. food too was good as we ordered pakoras.
name: Hitesh C

review: Well the hotel location is good, its near the bus/taxi stand. if you opt to stay at kotdwar and save some bugs by not staying at lansdowne than this is a good option. Rooms, service, food and bar is good.
name: akhil t

review: I will never suggest it to my biggest  enemy it was so bad.cannot say more..   the bed sheets were soiled the bathroom smelled horribly.as suggestion i would recomend go to lansdown do not waist your time money and energy....
name: Bhanu pratap Singh

review: Quite unique infra with all modern and daily amenities within premises or else round the corner. I recommend this hotel for business deals, family occasions, birthday parties or even any social gathering within their lounge or in bar
name: Vacation356502

review: It's a good choice for staying in Kotdwara, the owner, Mr. Rawat is nice & learned fellow. Very courteous & helpful. Staff is though typically 'pahadi' types but rooms are good, toilets neat & clean. It has an adjoining Bar & Resturant which serves nice food. All in all, if you are in Kotdwar you must stay here.... Value for money & comfortable stay.
name: Prashant Pansari
